summary: Hey could you write a fic where Carol's dad actually hurts Maria and/or Monica and what Carol's reaction is
question: Hey could you write a fic where Carol's dad actually hurts Maria and/or Monica and what Carol's reaction is
answer:
Hey anon, sorry for the wait! (I explained a bit why it took me so long on AO3, if you’re wondering)

Have You Seen Me Fly - Chapter 9

Lawson comes looking for Carol while she’s tinkering on the new experimental plane.

“Follow me”, the scientist says in a voice that doesn’t leave room for discussion. It’s a voice she rarely uses around Carol, and Carol knows something’s happened.

She expects Lawson to lead them to her office, but Lawson leads the way to the parking where Carol’s Mustang is parked at its usual spot.

“Listen to me Danvers, there was an incident at Maria’s house”, she raises a hand before Carol can react – respond – in any way, “she’s okay. But I want you to go check up on her. Take care of her and her daughter –“

Carol’s already in the Mustang before Lawson can even finish her sentence.

She’s probably never driven that fast.

Read the rest

Have You Seen Me Fly - Chapter 9

Lawson comes looking for Carol while she’s tinkering on the new experimental plane.

“Follow me”, the scientist says in a voice that doesn’t leave room for discussion. It’s a voice she rarely uses around Carol, and Carol knows something’s happened.

She expects Lawson to lead them to her office, but Lawson leads the way to the parking where Carol’s Mustang is parked at its usual spot.

Carol’s already in the Mustang before Lawson can even finish her sentence.

summary: 🌟🌟#AvengersEndgame regresa a los cines con nuevas escenas🌟🌟 Kevin Feige, presidente de Marvel Studios, lo confirmó durante una...
body:
🌟🌟#AvengersEndgame regresa a los cines con nuevas escenas🌟🌟

Kevin Feige, presidente de Marvel Studios, lo confirmó durante una entrevista en la gira promocional de Spider-Man: lejos de casa en Reino Unido hecha por Comicbook:

“Lo haremos, sí. No se si ya está anunciado y no se por cuánto tiempo, pero sí, lo haremos a partir de la próxima semana.” No será una versión extendida de la película pero, “Después de los créditos, habrá una escena eliminada, un pequeño homenaje y algunas sorpresas.”

Avengers: Endgame con 2.743 millones de dólares, está muy cerca de superar a “Avatar” con 2.788 millones de dólares, como la película más taquillera en todo el mundo

By:Larak Vixen #avengers #marvel #avatar #disney #leaguekawaii #ironman #captainmarvel #captainamerica #hulk #blackwidow #thor #haweye #antman

summary: Captain Marvel #7 Review
title: Captain Marvel #7 Review
body:
Captain Marvel #7 Review

Written by: Kelly Thompson
Art by: Annapaola Martello, Tamra Bonvillain, and VC’s Clayton Cowles
Cover Price: $3.99
Release Date: June 19, 2019

I really enjoyed the first issue of this War of the Realms tie-in mini-arc because it worked so well as a team-up book that just happened to be taking place during the Event. Of course, throw in a Freaky Friday scenario and I will always be in as well!…

View On WordPress

summary: LEGO San Diego Comic-Con exclusives - Captain Marvel, and Batman announced
title: LEGO San Diego Comic-Con exclusives - Captain Marvel, and Batman announced
body:
Coming to @Comic_Con this year are @LEGO_Group exclusives of @DCComics @DCBatman as part of his 80th Anniversary and @Marvel’ / @MarvelStudios’ @captainmarvel. #SDCC #Batman #CaptainMarvel #SDCC2019 #LEGO

With Comic-Con taking over most of downtown San Diego next month, the announcements for exclusives are coming real quick!

This week LEGO announced two new exclusives for SDCC, the first being Gotham City’s favorite hero with the city as a backdrop, with the second being Captain Marvel and her Asis ship.

The Batman set has 427 total pieces, and will retail for $45 USD while the Captain…
